channel.title: App on CEDIS
channel.description: Recent content in App on CEDIS

item.title: Contextus Portal
item.description: The app and site Contextus redefines scientific analysis with NLP and ML for direct interaction with academic knowledge.

item.title: MAGRA
item.description: The Undergraduate Analysis Model (MAGRA) enables the prediction of dropout rates in face-to-face undergraduate courses.

item.title: SAGA
item.description: The Academic Management Support System - SAGA is a tool developed to assist academic managers in monitoring indicators for undergraduate courses.
